mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoFaqAtchmnfl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FAQ_SN , FAQ_ATCHMNFL_TURN , FAQ_ATCH_FILE_NM , FAQ_ATCH_FILE_URL , FAQ_ATCH_FILE_CPCTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_FAQ_ATCHMNFL WHERE 1 = 1 AND FAQ_SN = #{faqSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND FAQ_ATCHMNFL_TURN = #{faqAtchmnflTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
